name: Meaco
0:
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, set the fan speed on the fan to 4”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Enjoy controlling your Meaco devices using only your voice. First, you must follow a few simple steps:
1. Download our Meaco app in the Android or iOS App Store and register an account.
2. Add your device/s to our Meaco app and give each product a name such as “Sefte” or “bedroom fan”.
3. Download the Amazon Alexa app in the Android or iOS App Store. 
4. In the Alexa App, go to the skills category, and search for Meaco.
5. Enable the Meaco skill, and you'll be navigated to the Meaco login page.
6. Follow the instructions on the page to link your Meaco device/s to your Alexa.

Now that the setup is complete, try out a command:
Alexa, turn on the fan.
Alexa, set the fan speed on the fan to 4.
Alexa, set the humidity to 55.
Alexa, set the mode on the dehumidifier to Laundry.
